ygData.subject: Eclipse Heritrix and the assert keyword
ygData.msgSnippet: I have an odd syntax error in Eclipse with any files that contain the assert keyword.  Anyone else notice this, is there a special workaround?  Thanks ~chris

I have an odd syntax error in Eclipse with any files that contain the
assert keyword.  Anyone else notice this, is there a special
workaround?  Thanks

~chris
